item.description:
Once again the last Friday of the month is upon us, which means a Critical Mass Ride. For those of you who have never participated in a critical mass ride I encourage you to give it try. Last month we had over 150 riders! It's a lot of fun and there is always a byob afterparty following every ride. So bring your bike down to the green at 5:45. The ride starts at 6:00. Tom (203)-444-6380 and Eric 860-214-9361 are the contacts for this event. Helmets are strongly encouraged.

Josh, thanks for the details...this month's ride will indeed be Hawaiian-Themed...so dress up your bike, your person, and your helmet! Steel drums optional.

The ride ends at a pot-luck, byob house party not to be missed! Need a bicycle? Check out New Haven Craigslist for a listing of for-sale bicycles.

Ride safe!
item.name: Critical Mass
